headline: Erste Group Analyst Upgrades Micron (MU) to Buy, Sees Strong Growth Ahead
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the AI Stocks On Wall Street’s Radar. On August 14, Erste Group analyst Hans Engel initiates coverage on the stock with a Buy rating after having the stock Under Review. The analyst stated that Micron’s positive update to Q4 guidance was “a significantly better development than previously expected.” Engel also […]

headline: Trump eyes US government stakes in other chip makers that received CHIPS Act funds, sources say
summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick is looking into the federal government taking equity stakes in computer chip manufacturers that receive CHIPS Act funding to build factories in the country, two sources said.  Expanding on a plan to receive an equity stake in Intel in exchange for cash grants, a White House official and a person familiar with the situation said Lutnick is exploring how the U.S. can receive equity stakes in exchange for CHIPS Act funding for companies such as Micron, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co and Samsung.  Micron, Samsung and the White House did not respond to requests for comment.

headline: JPMorgan Raises PT on Micron (MU), Keeps an Overweight Rating
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the Most Profitable Large Cap Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On August 12, JPMorgan raised the firm’s price target on Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) from $165 to $185, while keeping an Overweight rating on the stock.
